welcomeCurrentPoolSubText: Help us reach our goal! Every contribution makes a difference.
welcomeCurrentPoolDescriptionText:
The gauge below represents our current donation pool. Each donation is a fixed amount of {{var1}}, and our goal is to reach {{var2}}.

Once we hit this target, the entire amount will be donated back to YOU, one lucky donor.

It's a simple way to do good and potentially bring joy back into your life!

form.messageSuccess: Your message has been sent successfully!
form.messageFailed: Failed to send your message. Please try again.
form.messageError: There was an error. Please try again.
